mapper.select: SELECT PA.id as id, PA.photo_album_name as photo_album_name, PA.date_created as date_created, P.content as content, P.caption as caption, P.upload_date as upload_date from Photo_Album PA JOIN Photo P ON PA.id = P.photo_album_id WHERE PA.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Photo_Album (id, photo_album_name, date_created, album_profile_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{photoAlbumName}, #{dateCreated}, #{albumProfileId})
